scripts.build: bun scripts/check-legacy-cli.ts && bunx tsc --build --force && bun run --filter='./packages/*' --filter='./apps/*' build
scripts.test: bun test && cd packages/cli && bun run test && cd ../../apps/test-app && bun run test
scripts.typecheck: bunx tsc --build && cd apps/test-app && bunx tsc --build
scripts.all: bun clean && bun format && bun run build && bun lint && bun typecheck && bun run test
